ARTÍCULOS ARBITRADOS
Miramontes O, Juarez A, Rohani P (1998), Intrinsically generated coloured noise in laboratory insect populations, PROCEEDINGS OF THE ROYAL SOCIETY OF LONDON SERIES B-BIOLOGICAL SCIENCES, 265(1398), 785-792.
